      Reads string list from file
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null/empty then null is returned)
      aCommentLinePrefix - Prefix of comment line (may be null/empty)
      Returns:
      String list or null if string array could not be read

    • writeStringListToFile

      public static boolean writeStringListToFile(Iterable<String> aStringList, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Writes string list to file. NOTE: If destination file pathname already exists nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      aStringList - String list (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • appendStringListToFile

      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

      public static String[] readStringArrayFromFile(String aSourceFilePathname)

      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      Returns:
      String array or null if string array could not be read

    • writeBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMapToFile

      public static boolean writeBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMapToFile(HashMap<String,HashMap<String,LinkedList<String>>> aBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMap, String aDestinationFilePathname)
      Writes aBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMap to file. NOTE: Bases and nearest neighbors are sorted ascending in file. NOTE: If destination pathname already exists nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      aBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMap - Base to nearest-neighbor step-frequency map (may be null then false is returned)
      aDestinationFilePathname - Full pathname of destination (may be null then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

    • readBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMapFromFile

      Reads baseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMap from file which was written with method writeBaseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMapToFile().
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null then null is returned)
      Returns:
      Hash map baseToNearestNeighborStepFrequencyMap or null if information could not be read

      public static boolean copySingleFileToTemporaryDirectory(String aSourceFilePathname, String aNewFilename)
      Copies file defined in aSourceFilePathname to temporary directory of OS and renames the file to aNewFilename. If renamed file already exists in temporary directory of OS it is overwritten.
      Parameters:
      aSourceFilePathname - Full pathname of source (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      aNewFilename - New file name (may be null or empty then false is returned)
      Returns:
      true: Operation was successful, false: Operation failed

      Adds b to a (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      a_x - x-component of a (may be changed)
      a_y - y-component of a (may be changed)
      a_z - z-component of a (may be changed)
      b_x - x-component of b (is not changed)
      b_y - y-component of b (is not changed)
      b_z - z-component of b (is not changed)

    • copy_rOld_to_r_forFixedMolecules

      public static void copy_rOld_to_r_forFixedMolecules(int aCurrentTimeStep, MoleculeFixationInfo[] aMoleculeFixationInfos, float[] aR_x, float[] aR_y, float[] aR_z, float[] aRold_x, float[] aRold_y, float[] aRold_z)

      Parameters:
      aCurrentTimeStep - Current time step
      aMoleculeFixationInfos - Molecule fixation infos
      aR_x - Current x-position of particle in simulation box (may be changed)
      aR_y - Current y-position of particle in simulation box (may be changed)
      aR_z - Current z-position of particle in simulation box (may be changed)
      aRold_x - Old x-position of particle in simulation box (is NOT changed)
      aRold_y - Old y-position of particle in simulation box (is NOT changed)
      aRold_z - Old z-position of particle in simulation box (is NOT changed)

      aF_y - Current y-components of particle forces
      aF_z - Current z-components of particle forces
      aDpdMasses - DPD masses of particles
      aTimeStepLengthHalf - Half of time step length
      anIsDpdUnitMass - Flag for use of DPD unit masses. True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1, False: ...

      public static float[] calculateMinMeanMax(float[] aX, float[] aY, float[] aZ)
      Calculates min, mean and max magnitude of vector components if magnitude is not zero (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aX - x-component of vector
      aY - y-component of vector
      aZ - z-component of vector
      Returns:
      Array of length 3 with min (index 0), mean (index 1) and max (index 2) magnitude of (non-zero magnitude) vector components

    • scale_v

      public static float scale_v(float[] aV_x, float[] aV_y, float[] aV_z, float[] aDpdMasses, float aTemperature, boolean anIsDpdUnitMass)
      Scales v (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aV_x - Current x-components of particle velocities (may be changed)
      aV_y - Current y-components of particle velocities (may be changed)
      aV_z - Current z-components of particle velocities (may be changed)
      aDpdMasses - DPD masses of particles
      aTemperature - Temperature in DPD units (i.e. kT fractions, k: Boltzmann constant)
      anIsDpdUnitMass - Flag for use of DPD unit masses. True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1, False: ...
      Returns:
      Velocity scale factor

      aParticlePositionPool - Particle position pool
      aMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials - Maximum number of position correction trials
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal
